SEARCH
Package gw.api.assignment

Interface CCAssignableMethods

All Known Implementing Classes:
Activity, CCAssignableMethodsBaseImpl, Claim, Exposure, Matter, ServiceRequest, Subrogation
public interface CCAssignableMethods
Delegate interface implemented by all CC assignables. All the methods below will appear on every CC assignable (Claim, Exposure etc.), so you will be able to call, for example claim.createAssignmentReviewActivity() to create a new assignment review activity for a claim.

The methods in this interface are called to take care of the details of:

  • Manual assignment
  • Cascading assignment
  • Creating a history event when an item is assigned
  • Assigning to claim owner
The core assignment logic will call this delegate interface for each of these operations and each assignable can override the interface methods to take the appropriate action for the current type

    Description
    History
    createAssignmentHistoryEvent(Assignable assignable)
    Called after the assignable is assigned to create a new history event recording the assignment.

    IQueryResult<Activity,Activity>

    List<CCAssignableMethods>

  • Method Details

    • getOwningClaim

      Claim getOwningClaim()
      The claim that owns this assignable. If this property returns null then this assignable cannot be manually assigned (because no assignment review activity can be created), cannot be assigned using the "assignToClaimOwner" method and will not create history events when assigned.
      Returns:
      the claim

    • createAssignmentReviewActivity

      Activity createAssignmentReviewActivity()
      Create a new assignment review activity which represents the responsibility to assign this assignable. Assignment review activities are used for manual assignment.
      Returns:
      a new assignment review activity which refers to this assignable

    • findAssignmentReviewActivities

      IQueryResult<Activity,Activity> findAssignmentReviewActivities()
      Find any existing open assignment review activities related to this assignable. Normally this will return either zero or one activities. Assignment review activities are used for manual assignment.
      Returns:
      a query result containing the open assignment review activities, if any

    • pushAssignmentPopup

      void pushAssignmentPopup(List<CCAssignableMethods> assignables)
      Called when assigning one or more manually assigned assignables - that is, assignables that are in the manual/pending assignment state, referenced by assignment review activities. This method brings up the assignment popup, to finalize the assignment of the assignables. The list of argument assignables is guaranteed to be non empty and only contains assignables of the same type as this object. The first entry in the assignables list will be this assignable.

      So, for example, this method might be called on a claim to bring up the assignment popup to assign the claim plus, maybe, other claims as well.

      This method should only be called from a PCF page (or in a method called from a PCF page)

      Parameters:
      assignables - the items to be assigned. Guaranteed to be non empty, will contain this assignable plus, maybe, other assignables of the same type.

    • createAssignmentHistoryEvent

      History createAssignmentHistoryEvent(Assignable assignable)
      Called after the assignable is assigned to create a new history event recording the assignment. May return null for some assignable types, meaning that no history event was created
      Parameters:
      assignable - the assignable containing details of the new assignment
      Returns:
      the new history event, or null

    • shouldCascadeAssignment

      boolean shouldCascadeAssignment(Assignable parent, Key defaultOwnerUserId, Key defaultGroupId)
      Called on an assignable to decide if the assignment on the parent assignable should be cascaded to this assignable.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent assignable
      defaultOwnerUserId - the id of the special default owner user, used by the assignment engine as the user of last resort if, for example, assignment rules can't find an appropriate user.
      defaultGroupId - the id of the root group, used by the assignment engine as the group of last resort if, for example, assignment rules can't find an appropriate group.
      Returns:
      true if the assignment should be cascaded, false otherwise

    • getChildrenForCascadeAssignment

      List<CCAssignableMethods> getChildrenForCascadeAssignment()
      Returns the child objects of the current assignable to which the new assigment should maybe be cascaded. shouldCascadeAssignment will be called on each child before actually doing the cascade
      Returns:
      child objects to which the new assignment should potentially be cascaded

    • getOwningAssignable

      Assignable getOwningAssignable()
      Called by the "assignToClaimOwner" method to determine which assignable "owns" the current assignable so the owners assignment information can be copied. The owner is nearly always just the claim though there is a special case - if an activity belongs to an exposure then the exposure is the owner. If this method return null the assignToClaimOwner call will return false.
      Returns:
      the owning assignable, usually the claim
